pieceList.description: Rose Garden Witch Minion. Role: Landscaper.＠Its Witch styles its whiskers.
Rose Garden Witch Minion. Role: Alarm.＠A siren that rings upon finding humans, then charges at them headfirst. They have 20/20 Vision. Small ones can even turn into rose vines to catch intruders.
Darkness Witch Minion. Role: Dream.＠Changes form to depict their Witch's desires in the dark. Though mighty in the dark, even weak light - a flashlight, or even moonlight - can half its power.
Candy Witch Minion. Role: Cheese Scout.＠Don't rely on it too much.
Box Witch Minion. Role: Hauler.＠Everything it touches becomes light and easy to lift.

Graffiti Witch's Minion. Role: Eternal Child.＠Seperated from their Witch while playing alone. A human transformed into a ball by its powers must bounce as many times as lies they have told in their life, if they want to regain their lost form.
Silver Witch Minion. Role: Assertor.＠Emits a mix of clangs and bangs from its many pipes, and moves with the chaotic whimsy of a sandstorm. It hates magnets.

pieceSkill2.name: Resist DOWN [IV]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Status Ailment Resistance DOWN [IV] (Single Target/1 Turn)

pieceList.description: Shadow Witch Minion. Role: Blind Follower.＠A group of lives given grace by their Witch. They seek new brethren.
Dog Witch Minion. Role: Interior Designer.＠A mannequin that spins mindlessly. The unloved Dog Witch couldn't make a Minion with a mind of its own.
Artist Witch Minion. Role: Art Work.＠Takes body parts from their Witch's victims and incorporates them into themselves.
Rooftop Witch Minion. Role: Confiner.＠Always worrying that their Witch might fly away. They move around the school checking all the locks while cleaning. They never forget to point things out.
Sandbox Witch Minion. Role: Toy Train.＠Always playing with fellow Minions. Due to its texture and how it rolls on the ground, it always gets things stuck to itself.
Symbol Witch Minion. Role: Reproducer.＠It is said that it grows and transforms by absorbing vital energy from humans. This version is known as a Haunted Chair.
Sheep Witch Minion. Role: Shepherd.＠Strolls around the Labyrinth at ease. These Minions regard their Witch as their most precious possession.
There is a vast gap between ordinary girls and Magical Girls. An invisible but tremendous gap. However, armed with their "feelings" and "wishes" they can cross that gap in a single step.
Isn't this too flashy? The ribbon I picked out with my mom flutters in the breeze. I feel at ease, untouched by despair. "Yeah, a Magical Girl is still just a girl after all."

Three girls stand by Madoka Kaname. One is her carefree friend, one a dependable senpai, and the last, a mysterious transfer student... Each girl watches from their respective positions, bearing their own desires.

Like a great river, time flows from the past to the future. Resisting the current countless times, she continues her endless journey. She leaps into the torrent again, motivated by both an oath to herself and her irreplaceable friends.

pieceList.pieceName: It's Not a Stuffed Animal, Is It?
pieceList.description: Kyubey, you sure are strange... That thing coming out from your ear... Is that...a lock of hair or another...arm...? Those rings...are they attached to you or just floating there? And your tail!...Oh, I just want to grab it...

I can step forward knowing Mami will be ahead of me, no matter how unthinkable, bizarre or terrifying the situation might get. I can be brave with her by my side. Thank you for being so strong, so kind, so caring... I love you.

Kyoko: "Hey, Sayaka! Gimme a bite of that!"＠Sayaka: "What?! Another one?!＠Kyoko, do you even know what "a bite" means?"＠Mami: "Oh, this will make the perfect picture! Say cheese!"＠ Sayaka & Kyoko: "Huh?"
There must be a way for the two of them to spend their days together, smiling and happy. She believes this with conviction. She just hasn't found it yet. She will find it. She has to....

These Girls don't regret becoming Magical Girls, because it's something they chose... They have resolved themselves not to flee from their fates. They face them head on and live so fiercely that they light the world in a brilliant blaze.
One girl made a contract.＠The other is hesitant to make her own.＠Still they stay together.＠They are friends, Magical Girl or not.

pieceSkill.name: Charge UP [V]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [V] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceSkill2.name: Charge UP [VI]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [VI] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceList.description: A Magical Girl who has been fighting by herself has finally gotten a partner... A partner who calls her "Senpai". Through countless battles, their hearts grow ever closer.
I'll walk my own runway no matter what you say!＠It's my best chance of reaching the rest of the world!＠Paris, Rome, Milan, New York, London...＠One day they'll be backdrops to my showstopping clothes!
We can do it! Don't give up 'til it's over!＠I'm cheering for you at every turn!＠So keep your chin up and fight!＠Go! Fight! Win! Believe in yourself!＠Victory is yours!
Your first hint is a curious giggle. Then come glowing liquids, colorful smoke, and maybe even an explosion or two. It's the curtain call for the world's most exciting show!
Student council calls after badminton club is over! But first...a little break. Sasara Minagi has a lot of things to do after school. Not to mention her Magical Girl missions!

Flower arranging is like a mirror. You observe your own heart as you work, rather than the flowers. The beauty you see on the surface is only skin deep; true beauty is found only beyond the work you refine and hone.

pieceList.pieceName: Like, Those Are Meant for Me!
pieceList.description: Ooooooh my god! Like, I'm freaking out, these shoes are so cute! Can you believe this?! They're totes perfect! I gotta have 'em! I'm saying I have to have them on my feet like, right this second. For sure. ...One thing, though, like, the price? Totally not cute enough. Fix it for me?

Nothing feels right, not at my house, my school, the town... No matter where I walk, who I talk with, I feel like I'm shrouded in a thin film keeping me from fitting into the rest of the world...I wonder if he felt the same way, trying to find where he belongs. I too must find where I belong, someday...

Between helping the needy, karate practice and Witch hunts... Everyday life can kick my butt kinda hard! But back in my room it's my time. I can read girly manga or romance novels with my stuffed animal and dolls. I gotta watch the new episode of the drama I recorded too! Will those two get together this time..?!
The dishes she creates shock and delight, causing even renowned gourmet critics and famous chefs to gasp in admiration... She might be young, but her talent is just as genuine as herself.
Paradise in my eyes is when books lie in heaped piles around me, tea and snacks within sight. I turn the pages gradually, not wanting to rush this lovely moment...!
A calm afternoon, just after midday. No matter how bossy she is in public, with her mother she's just a child. She knows she can't stay like this forever, but for now, let her dream a little...
Here we go...! Whooooooa! Feel the wrath of Chinese Kung Fu! Wh-wha?! Don't leap out from the hat yet! Grrr! You were supposed to wait for the punchline!

Her spirit won't be permeated by the endless struggles of this world. The goings-on of her friends, family, even perfect strangers surround her but never involve her. Her heart is frozen shut, empty of emotion... Or so she thought. Now the ice has started melting and she's started to lose her bearings.
The aroma, the colors, the shape— No, not just that. She picks just the right ribbons and wraps the sender's feelings inside. Here, take the feelings and the bouquet.

It's okay if I'm only dreaming, or even if it's all an illusion. Put aside any thoughts of guilt or deception. Just for now, I want to take in this sweet smell for a little longer, and let it cloud my senses.
What future will rise to the surface of her teacup? Salvation or ruin? Hope or despair? Her partner alone may lift her malaise by loading her cup with jam and sugar cubes.
Hey, don't look so sad. I'll take half your bags.＠There, now we can go wherever you want to go!
Not her mother nor her father. The first person to hold this girl's hand was a "hero" she knew nothing about. She no longer has to fear Witches or lonely nights.
Even if reality hits hard, stand up. Whether it's inevitable or not, now isn't the time to despair. You can become much stronger with friends by your side.
Is that mild smile that of an angel, or maybe a devil? We know not whose hand shapes the future, but it stirs now. Not even the gods know where she will go.

I wonder why Ui suddenly wanted a sketchbook? There do happen to be lots of talented girls around her... I wonder if she wants to measure up to them...? Hehe, I'm looking forward to whatever she draws.

Whenever I wonder why I keep on modeling, I remember that my life as a Magical Girl started from here. If I were to quit, why, that would render everything: all the trials and tribulations, all the miseries and joys, rather pointless.

pieceList.pieceName: I'm Even the Mightiest at Hoops!

pieceSkill.name: Solidify [VII]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: DEF UP [VII] / Status Ailment Resistance UP [VI] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceSkill2.name: Solidify [VIII]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: DEF UP [VIII] / Status Ailment Resistance UP [VII] (Self/1 Turn)

pieceList.description: If you wanna be the Mightiest Magical Girl, you need to be the best at everything! Basketball is no exception! Pass the ball to me, I'll score for sure! Traveling? What's that? Silly rules like that can't stop ME!

pieceList.pieceName: It's Not Like I Was Waiting
pieceList.description: Eating all my favorite sweets, my phone almost running out of batteries, sighing in disappointment... These things have nothing to do with you. Not at all. It's not like I was waiting or anything.

Even you, who I love so much, have bad days, for sure. Even still, you bring a smile to my face and give me courage. I can stand on my own personal stage as long as you're there. I scream with all my might, so you can shine from your idol's pedestal.

Do you like this tasty water? What kind of food do you like? How about whistling? I know we can't communicate...So I'll try to figure it out myself. Will you be my friends? We could play together, then take a nap...I'd love it if we could chat in my dreams.

Every morning I start by cleaning the dojo, and then... 1,000 practice swings! This is important! However! Don't just swing recklessly... Calm your nerves and check each and every movement! Every lunge counts in a real battle!

Momoko: "All right, we gotta beat Yachiyo.＠Let's quickly take care of these Minions, Iroha!"＠Iroha: "Right! The small Kyubey is leading us,＠but that doesn't mean we can lower our guard!＠I'll support from behind!"

Gentle sweetness paired with a hint of sour opens hearts.＠Three girls eat pudding as proof of their reconciliation.＠They also eat to welcome a new Magical Girl to Kamihama.＠"This makes Iroha our friend, too!"

Though they may squabble, the trust between these three is sincere. When a battle begins it's as if they had never argued at all. They fight in perfect sync, defeating enemy after enemy. "Rena take that one in the middle, Kaede tackle the ones on the sides! Leave the rear to me!"
Momoko: "You ready, Rena? Kaede?"＠Kaede: "Y...Yes..."＠Rena: "Pfft, who do you think you're talking to? Of course I am."＠Momoko: "All right! Time to hunt some Witches!"
I'm a Magical Girl! A Magical Girl who grants wishes and makes dreams come true! But, that's a secret, so... Please don't tell my classmates!
Wearing matching glasses, they walk through town admiring the same old scenery with a new perspective through the lenses. Hearts united, they walk until the sun sets...

One slices through night shadows with her sharp blade, one blasts through nightmares with her gun, one spears the threat with a wavering lance; one strides through time, buckler shimmering, entwining their fates all the more.
Sayaka: "Here I come.... Splash attack!"＠Madoka: "Eep! Hey, Sayaka! It's cooooold!"＠Kyoko: "Ugh, quit it! My ice cream's gonna melt!"＠Sayaka: "Heheh, melt away!"
We won't lose, no matter what Witch we take on! There's no fate we can't change! Magical Girls make hopes and dreams come true. If we keep believing, we can make miracles happen!
I feel warm when I dream about you. Now that I remember the reason I became a Magical Girl, I know why... Wait for me... No matter how hard it may be, I won't give up until I find you.
In my many days of battle, I've seen countless sad sights, and endured just as many bitter moments... No matter what, I've resolved to live, so my past does not lose its meaning...

I'm bearing the future of my family on my own two shoulders... Under pressure? You bet! But I'll take care of it! I just gotta grab whatever chances I can, and tackle 'em with all I've got! Leave it to me, Tsuruno Yui!

Inside every person, there's a brightness...their hopes and dreams. I see it eeeverywhere! I won't let them be snuffed out... I'll protect them, keep them burning! I mean, that's what a Magical Girl does after all!

pieceSkill.name: Inevitable Adept [V]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Critical Hit Chance [V] / Negate Evade (Self/3 Turns)

pieceSkill2.name: Inevitable Adept [VI]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Critical Hit Chance [VI] / Negate Evade (Self/3 Turns)

pieceList.description: I promised back then. That I would protect and save you. Even if that means I have to leap through time over and over again, I won't regret that choice. If there's enemies in the way, I won't hesitate to pull the trigger. Wait for me, Madoka... I'll change fate for you!

pieceSkill.name: Revenge Adept [IV]
pieceSkill.shortDescription: Get More MP when Hit by Weak Element [IV]

pieceSkill2.name: Revenge Adept [V]
pieceSkill2.shortDescription: Get More MP when Hit by Weak Element [V]

pieceList.description: The aroma of tea wafts through the air, soothing her body.＠The flavor of tea after a Witch's defeat is her favorite...＠Slowly bringing in peace in such a fashion,you'd never imagine she was battling mere moments before.

A nutritionally balanced recipe written with specific instructions.＠Seems like Iroha's handwriting, but she doesn't recall writing it.＠ She tries making it, but she has no idea, in that moment, who she wrote it for.

Cursed chain mail that tears out your soul... A mysterious soldier appearing in a Sankyo Ward school... Credible rumors and urban legends like this are logged in the "Kamihama Rumor Files". A new rumor was added just today.

An old Chinese restaurant stands downtown. It was started by her grandfather and great-grandfather, who brought back their knowledge of Chinese cuisine from their time in the military. Many people think the food there looks and tastes "Okay".
Idols shine like stars. Even their merchandise glows bright and true. Every time she sees that shining scenery, she hates herself a little more.

She thinks she's too boyish to join in with girl talk. The truth is that she actually loves girly cute things more than anyone. When will the time come for a girl who believes she doesn't fit the typical image of feminimity to come out about her inner little girl?
A girl who has loved the company of plants and animals from a young age. She is best friends with all creatures, and they know it. A home filled with nature is Heaven on Earth to her.

When the mind is unjust, the sword is sure to follow. She has honed her skills to that mantra, that she might one day inherit her family's historic dojo. Her straightforward attitude and highly polished swordsmanship have nearly reached the level where she can do just that.

I still can't settle on what wish I want granted... It would be great to become a glorious hero, helping others just like Mami... Before she knew it, being a Magical Girl had become a dream for Madoka.

pieceList.pieceName: I Want to Be Able to Protect Her
pieceList.description: I want the power to protect her. This is the wish that made her a Magical Girl. She will do anything it takes to protect the person she swore to protect, no matter how dangerous.
An elegantly arranged afternoon tea spread. Rest is absolutely vital for girls who wish to continue fighting.

I want to be a fashion designer who makes clothes that speak to the whole world! She refines her fashion sense every day in pursuit of that dream. True, her tastes are unusual and surprise those around her. But she refuses to let that bring her down, and persists nonetheless.

To her, happiness is playing baseball with everyone.＠Even when breaking a sweat during summer with the boys,＠or bleeding profusely from both her hands in the winter,＠she was happy because everyone was there with her.

She has become ever more absorbed, day after day, since she learned how charming chemistry can be. Today's agenda is the "Chameleon Experiment": Each vial changes to a different color depending on the reaction within, much like a beautiful art piece.
As a child, she watched her father as he put his life on the line to save others. He looked like a brave knight in a picture book. That admiration transformed into a desire to be just like him.
In Japanese tea ceremony, there is a useful idiom: Ichigo Ichie. It means that you may meet someone only one time in your life. This is why we do our best to deliver the finest hospitality.

There is a strange rumor in Kamihama. There is a girl at a mysterious counseling room in the Suitoku Shopping Mall who can solve any problem you bring to her. Everyday, some lost lamb visits her there.

There is a girl who helps out at an old fashioned coffee shop where the sun lights up the room and the young and old alike gather. With her calm aura she fits the atmosphere well, but if you watch her closely, you might notice her making a melancholy expression...

She was taught from childhood that the power of martial arts is "for giving a helping hand to those who need it". She was raised to gain strength through those principles, and that is why she can sport her black belt at this young age.

Her family runs a traditional restaurant that serves up an array of taste sensations. The quality isn't diminished when packed into a bento box, hence the high volume of repeat customers. Customers who can't manage to secure one of the limited boxes come back and try again another day.

She loves reading and resides in "Natsume Books". Whenever she is at home or the library, she buries herself in words and loses all track of time. A life spent in the company of books is her personal paradise.

A girl from the Blue Seas Family, wishing to become someone others could rely on, instead of being someone who relies on others, trained tirelessly to acquire the Kung Fu technique, "Blue Jade Fist." The bloody journey of her training is told in the scarred, damaged body of this wooden dummy.

pieceList.pieceName: Smile and the World Smiles Too
pieceList.description: She admired her friend who was bright like the sun and had an infectious smile. Eventually, she resolved to become that kind of person herself.

She tried her hand at studying, hobbies, learning crafts, all manner of things. She has been swimming since she was a child. All this, and yet nothing holds any interest for her. She spends every day in a state of pure boredom.

Passion, friendship, faith, peace, optimism...＠Resentment, enmity, doubt, turmoil, misery...＠Each and every flower carries a message.＠This is one of the things that gives flowers＠their beauty and allure.
She's in love with all the most popular fashions, all the latest cosmetics. She loves girly fashion, but she is often treated with prejudice for her appearance.

Since my childhood, I have read "Crime and Punishment" more times than I can recall. The protagonist bears a striking resemblance to that girl. However, only those who can bear the "weight of death" are fit to become her pawns.

All that's left inside her is "love". Usamaru was the first present she received from her beloved Oriko. The same deep affection she has for Oriko, she has for Usamaru as well. She will do anything in the name of that "love".

The hero who saved her placed a candy into her hand. Its sweetness washed the bad memories away in just one bite. I want to fight alongside my hero, she thought, and swore silently to herself that she would.

Perhaps another world could have existed where witches weren't a part of my day-to-day life. Maybe I would have gone to school like normal, chatted with friends like normal, and gone home after school like normal.

My wish was such a petty, little thing. I thought it was a good one, but in the end it was a big mistake... Which is why I promised myself, from now on, no more mistakes. I'm just gonna live for myself. That's my conviction, and I won't falter in it.

campaignList.title: Release Celebration Login Bonus
campaignList.description: Available Until 7/9 11:59 pm pdt＠Trade Release Celebration Medals＠for Iroha's Swimsuit Outfit!

chara.name: Iroha Tamaki
chara.description: Iroha came to Kamihama to investigate strange dreams she was having. Kind-hearted, she tends to worry too much about others. She's not up on the latest trends and isn't good with her phone. Usually reserved, she can be a fighter when it matters most.

charaMessageList.message: Is this what people call...bonds?
How long...since we've eaten out as a family?
I lied to myself... I didn't want them to dislike me.
Welcome back. I've been waiting for you.
I'm only interfering because you're so precious to me!
I'm sorry... Your big sis is actually...
A little bitter… This taste brings back such good memories.
Good thing I didn't give up!
I had faith that we'd be okay.
Your big sis did it!
Have I become a strong big sis?

cardMagia.name: Strada Futuro
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [I] / Revive

cardMagia.name: Strada Futuro
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [I] / Revive

cardMagia.name: Strada Futuro
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [II] / Revive

chara.name: Yachiyo Nanami
chara.description: A seasoned Magical Girl who has fought Witches for 7 years in Kamihama. Yachiyo is well informed about the city and Magical Girls in general. She keeps her distance from other Magical Girls while she compiles files on the Rumors of Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message: I hope you learned your lesson and won't do it again.
I don't see my donut. Where is it?
All right. I accept your challenge.
We Magical Girls must not harm each other.
Listen. We are on the same side...
Life as a Magical Girl isn't easy.
I will protect everyone no matter what happens.
I survived again...
Well, that ended okay.
I will not die! Not here!
I will protect you... I promise.

cardMagia.name: Absolute Rain
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [I] / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I'll Light the Way
cardSkill.shortDescription: Blast Damage UP [III] / Critical Hit Chance [III]

cardMagia.name: Absolute Rain
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [III] / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I'll Light the Way
cardSkill.shortDescription: Blast Damage UP [V] / Critical Hit Chance [V]

cardMagia.name: Absolute Rain
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [V] / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns) / ATK UP (Self /3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I'll Light the Way
cardSkill.shortDescription: Blast Damage UP [VII] / Critical Hit Chance [VII]

chara.name: Tsuruno Yui
chara.description: A reckless Magical Girl who's full of energy. Tsuruno loves her family, especially her grandfather and great-grandfather, who lead the Yuis to their former prosperity. She fights to become the strongest Magical Girl in order to restore the Yui name.

charaMessageList.message: But I wanted to train harder and become even mightier!
We all start out with equal strength!
If you're strong enough, ANYTHING is possible!
Impulsive? Reckless? What does that even mean?!
Ugh... I got yelled at… Again!
Yay! I'm the Mightiest Magical Girl!
Yeah! YEAH! This is what I call training!
I feel like I'm getting even more powerful!
I'm telling ya! I can't lose!
This proves how mighty I REALLY am!
Ya gotta admit it! Right now I am the mightiest!

cardMagia.name: Flame Waltz
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [II] / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Flame Waltz
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [IV] / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Flame Waltz
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [VI] / Blast Damage UP / Accele MP UP (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Rena Minami

doppel.name: Doppel of Transformation
doppel.title: Feature: Glass Slipper
doppel.description: The master of this emotion uses its power to their utmost content. This Doppel enhances the transforming ability of its possessor manyfold, allowing her to transform into someone else for a certain amount of time. The result of this transformation is truer to the ideal image of the person than the actual person it is based on. However, because the transformation is so perfect, if it is used too much, the user is likely to lose track of their own identity. It turns the user into the ideal state of its target, so it sometimes appears slightly different from the original.

chara.description: A Magical Girl who has trouble opening up to others. Rena acts cocky to make up for her lack of self-confidence, which leads people who don't know her well to misunderstanding her. She's a picky eater and loves sweets. She is also a big fan of idols.

charaMessageList.message: Oh, Momoko... What're you doing now?!
O-okay then... Become my servant!
I'm back to being alone...
Hehe...I love this concert DVD!
You're the one who started this fight!!
Even I hate me...
I told you! I'm not mad at you at all!!
This result seems quite natural to me, y'know?
You're not bad.
This is all thanks to you. Thank you.
It's definitely high five time!

cardMagia.name: Infinite Poseidon
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Charge MP (Self)

cardSkill.name: Here I Am Again to Help You
cardSkill.shortDescription: ATK UP [VII] / Accele MP UP [VII] / Critical Hit Chance [VII]

cardMagia.name: Infinite Poseidon
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Charge MP (Self) / Accele MP UP (Self/3 Turns)

doppelCardMagia.name: Doppel of Transformation
doppelCardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [IX] / Charge MP / Accele MP UP (Self /3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: Here I Am Again to Help You
cardSkill.shortDescription: ATK UP [IX] / Accele MP UP [IX] / Critical Hit Chance [IX]

chara.name: Momoko Togame

doppel.name: Doppel of Self Discipline
doppel.title: Feature: Nails
doppel.description: The master of this emotion cares not where its power fly. This Doppel attacks with its huge fingers, along with the many fingers that fly around it. All the nails on the fingers are polished and decorated. It cares very much about its nails. When someone praises them, it becomes quite happy, but when someone says something bad about them, it gets discouraged and depressed. It is quite troublesome to deal with when this happens, so it is a good idea to let it attack the enemy as soon as you summon it.

chara.description: A Magical Girl who is always looking out for rookies. The middle child, Momoko was influenced by her two brothers' boyishness, but she loves cute, girly things like stuffed animals. Because she loves cute things she's also a fan of female idols.

charaMessageList.message: Is it wrong? I love idols!
Why'd I become a Magical Girl again…?
Call me a meddler if you want. I can't just ignore this!
Me likin' somethin' like this…it's weird, huh?
Why've I grown into such a tough girl?
My team's well-balanced! Don't you think?
Aww...I always have the worst timing!
Neat and clean, just the way I like it!
It's all about team work, right?
I'm countin' on you to back me up from here on!
All of us are here! It was bound to turn out like this.

cardMagia.name: The Universe's Edge
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Damage After Using Charge UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: So What If I'm Overbearing?!
cardSkill.shortDescription: ATK UP [VII] / Damage After Using Charge UP [VII] / Ignore Defense

cardMagia.name: The Universe's Edge
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [VII] / Damage After Using Charge UP / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

doppelCardMagia.name: Doppel of Self Discipline
doppelCardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [IX] / Damage After Using Charge UP / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: So What If I'm Overbearing?!
cardSkill.shortDescription: ATK UP [IX] / Damage After Using Charge UP [IX] / Ignore Defense

chara.name: Kaede Akino
chara.description: A worrywart, Kaede is easily scared. She is also kind, caring, and ready to take risks for her friends. She loves animals, plants, and insects, and nature in general. She enjoys gardening, and though she's not good at them, she likes UFO Catchers.

charaMessageList.message: Why did I agree to become a Magical Girl?
This way! W-wait! No, this way!
That's so m-mean! Um...I...I'm sorry...
I want to be your teammate again...!
I keep holding them back...
Oh, no! I spent 5,000 yen on this...
Huh? Oh, wh-what should I do?!
I won...right?
What a relief…
Wow! Amazing!
I…I can do it too!

cardMagia.name: Judgment Earth
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Stronger Elemental Damage to All Enemies [IV]

cardSkill.name: I-I'll Help With What I Can!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Inflicted Damage UP [V] / MP Gain UP [V]

cardMagia.name: Judgment Earth
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Stronger Elemental Damage to All Enemies [VI] / Fog (All Foes /3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I-I'll Help With What I Can!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Inflicted Damage UP [VII] / MP Gain UP [VII]

chara.name: Asuka Tatsuki
chara.description: An assistant Naginata instructor at the Ryushinkan Dojo and Magical Girl. As the only child of the Dojo Master, she trains hard everyday. She is disciplined, but also absentminded, and that absentmindedness can get her into trouble.

charaMessageList.message: Oof! This is Asuka Tatsuki's worst blunder ever!
I-I'm going to kill myself! Don't try to stop me!
I regret nothing!
I have no choice but to use my last resort!
I will not run...or hide...or disappear!
Stop toying with me!
If I give up now, it'd be a disgrace to Ryushin-ryu!
Victory is mine!
This is the way of Ryushin-ryu!
Never let your guard down, even after victory!
We won! Let me hear a triumphant cheer!

cardMagia.name: Shining Dragon Fang
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [III] / Guaranteed Taunt (Self /1 Turn) / HP Regeneration (Self /1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Shining Dragon Fang
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Guaranteed Taunt (Self /1 Turn) / HP Regeneration (Self /3 Turns)

chara.name: Madoka Kaname

doppel.name: Doppel of Mercy
doppel.title: Feature: Salvation
doppel.description: The master of this emotion tries to save all of existence. This Doppel appears as a huge floating Soul Gem. Once it is summoned, it creates an existence within which all things around it are consumed, and then takes control of everything within that existence. After that, it floats higher into the air and a shower of light arrows rains down. While all of this is happening, the master of this emotion sleeps inside the huge Soul Gem.

chara.description: A Magical Girl with extraordinary potential who lives in Mitakihara with her parents and younger brother. Gentle and caring, she is always surrounded by friends. She uses a bow and arrow in battle.

charaMessageList.message: Hmmm... Which ribbon should I wear?
I don't know much about this city... It sure is strange, though...
I'm a Magical Girl…so I have to do this!
Is this…real?
Were you the one who was calling me?
Don't tell anyone in class, okay?
If I'm awesome, it'll all work out!
Thank goodness...it looks we've won!
We did it! Great!
Yes! Looking good!
Phew... We made it through somehow!

cardMagia.name: Pluvia☆Magica
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [IV] / Charge MP (Team)

cardMagia.name: Pluvia☆Magica
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [VI] / Charge MP (Team) / Reduce Damage (Team/3 Turns)

doppelCardMagia.name: Doppel of Mercy
doppelCardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [VIII] / Charge MP (Team) / Reduce Damage (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Homura Akemi
chara.title: Glasses
chara.description: A timid Magical Girl who wished to protect Madoka. She turns back time repeatedly in an attempt to prevent Madoka from becoming a Witch. Now she searches for a new hope in Kamihama City.

charaMessageList.message: I... I want to redo my meeting with Madoka!
I want to be someone who can protect her...
Where am I? What is this place...
I'll never, ever give up!
Which weapon should I use this time?
Let's do our best together from now on!
I'll save Madoka for sure this time!
I did it? I did it!
Phew...it's over now...
I got through it...somehow...
Did I fight well…?

cardMagia.name: Time Stop Special
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [V] / Skill Surge (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Mami Tomoe

doppel.name: Doppel of Invitations
doppel.title: Feature: Dressing Up
doppel.description: The master of this emotion trusts not in it and battles on, regardless of its presence. This Doppel is very small compared to other Doppels and always sits on its master's head, so the master is hardly aware of it. It is doubtful that they communicate, so its master fights normally while it supports her. It is small and looks unreliable, but its vines are powerful enough to penetrate any enemy.

chara.description: A Magical Girl who has been fighting Witches in Mitakihara longer than the others. She is experienced and takes care of Madoka and her friends. She is proud of being able to save people, and loves tea.

charaMessageList.message: This town is like a maze. I feel so uncertain...
Believe in yourself and fight. The rest will follow.
Shall we have a tea break?
Being a Magical Girl is no walk in the park.
What dream do you intend to make a reality?
What's going on in in this city…?
Oh… Could you beat me on equal footing?
One job done.
Phew... That was close!
All right then. Time for some tea.
Want to come to my place after this?

cardMagia.name: Tiro Finale
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [VI] / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / DEF DOWN (Self/1 Turn)

cardSkill.name: Tiro Duet!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted UP [VII] / Guaranteed Bind / Guaranteed Burn

cardMagia.name: Tiro Finale
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [VIII] / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / Burn (Team/3 Turns) / DEF DOWN (Self/1 Turn)

doppelCardMagia.name: Doppel of Invitations
doppelCardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [X] / Skill Surge (Team/1 Turn) / Burn (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: Tiro Duet!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted UP [IX] / Guaranteed Bind / Guaranteed Burn

chara.name: Kyoko Sakura

doppel.name: Doppel of Desperation
doppel.title: Feature: Warrior Actress
doppel.description: The master of this emotion doesn't trust its mysterious power, she only borrows its weapon and wields it herself. To the master, it's is no more than a hateful thing that drags up her painful past due to its power, a dubious hypnotic magic that controls mist to produce illusions. But even still, it possesses her regrets, hidden deep in her heart, so she allows it to aid her somewhat in battle, though she remains suspicous of it. The Doppel itself is the fluttering kimono-like thing, while the candlestick holder the master rides is a separate being altogether.

chara.description: Kyoko is a Magical Girl from Kazamino who doesn't seem to go to school or have a home. Defiant and pragmatic, she often butts heads with other Magical Girls. She wields a multi-jointed spear, and can create magical barriers. She is always snacking.

charaMessageList.message: Ya look like ya stress out real easy.
Naive Magical Girls get killed quick.
...Well, a free meal's a free meal.
I'm gonna survive no matter what.
I can't just ignore idiots like that.
If ya get it, then don't be a dumbass.
Substance over style, that's me.
I'll take the win, thanks!
Well that went well!
Now then. What to eat?
They're gonna feel that one!

cardMagia.name: Kugatachi
cardMagia.shortDescription: Elemental Damage UP [V] (All Enemies) / ATK UP (Self/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Kugatachi
cardMagia.shortDescription: Elemental Damage UP [VII] (All Enemies) / Attack UP (Self/3 Turns) / Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

doppelCardMagia.name: Doppel of Desperation
doppelCardMagia.shortDescription: Elemental Damage UP [IX] (All Enemies) / Attack UP (Self/3 Turns) & Blast Damage UP (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Kanoko Yayoi
chara.description: A Magical Girl who wants to become a fashion designer. The only child of a family that runs a sheet metal plant, her parents' expectations that she will take over the business stress her out. Although she gets strange looks, she is always serious.

charaMessageList.message: Magical Girl, Boy, I'll become either!
I trust my instincts!
Dad...Mom...I'm sorry!
I wanna be a fashion designer!
I'm not giving up on my dream yet!
Is it okay for my life to keep going this way…?
I want to walk my own runway!
I can't give up. Not now, not here!
As I calculated, we won!
Stylish win!
My victory is a sure bet!

cardMagia.name: Yayoi Collection
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [I] / Guaranteed Charm (Target/1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Yayoi Collection
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals 2 Random Hits [III] / Guaranteed Charm (Target/1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Yayoi Collection
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals 3 Random Hits [V] / Guaranteed Charm (Target/1 Turn)

chara.name: Natsuki Utsuho
chara.description: An enthusiastic supporter of everyone around her, there isn't a Magical Girl livelier than Natsuki. She is a huge fan of baseball, and as a cheerleader and the baseball team's manager, she's there for the team year round.

charaMessageList.message: You can win for sure! I guarantee it!
I didn't just want to play baseball…
I always dreamed of fighting together.
Well, I'm not cheering for nothing.
If only things could stay like this forever…
I made up my mind! I'm going to cheer for everyone's future!
Go for it! I'm cheering for all of you!
Don't forget to stretch after the game!
Nice play! Good work!
I gave it everything I got too!
Yeah! Let's win again!

cardMagia.name: Go! Fight! Win!
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [I] / DEF UP / ATK UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Go! Fight! Win!
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [III] / DEF UP / ATK UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Go! Fight! Win!
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / DEF UP / ATK UP / Reduce Damage (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Hinano Miyako
chara.description: She may look young but Hinano is a seasoned Magical Girl. She has a mind for science and is president of the chemistry club. Although popular with the younger crowd, she is often made fun of for her childish stature. She strives to be more "mature."

charaMessageList.message: Hehe...! I thought of a good idea for the show!
Hey! Don't look down on me like that!
Potassium iodide...our special ingredient!
A social life? Blow it to pieces with ethanol!
Don't forget that I'm your senpai!
I'm going to bring you back from this Labyrinth safe and sound.
It's time to start the most exciting show around!
Yep, I'm satisfied!
This proves my hypothesis!
This is going to make for a great article!
The experiment was a huge success!

cardMagia.name: Atomo Arrabbiato
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [I] / Poison Chance (All Foes/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Atomo Arrabbiato
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [III] / Poison Chance (All Foes/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Atomo Arrabbiato
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [V] / Poison Chance (All Foes/3 Turns) / Guaranteed Stun (All Foes/1 Turn)

chara.name: Sasara Minagi
chara.description: A Magical Girl with a strong sense of justice. As a kid, Sasara was obsessed with a knight in a picture book and swore to become someone who could save people too. Taking after her Rescue Squad father, she'd rather save a life than kill an enemy.

charaMessageList.message: Can I save people, like my dad?
I wanna be a knight like in that picture book.
My sword shall be used to protect.
Isn't it lonely being a Magical Girl?
Maybe I should become a member of the rescue squad!
Is it because...I want someone to thank me...?
I became a Magical Girl...no, a knight!
I'm gonna get even stronger!
I'm happy that I can protect everyone...!
I wish Dad could see me doing this.
This is the duty of a knight!

cardMagia.name: Knight's Resolve
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [I] / Guaranteed Taunt (Self /1 Turn) / DEF UP (Self/1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Knight's Resolve
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [III] / Guaranteed Taunt (Self /1 Turn) / DEF UP (Self/1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Knight's Resolve
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [V] / Guaranteed Taunt (Self /1 Turn) / Endure (Self /1 Turn)

chara.name: Nanaka Tokiwa
chara.description: A Magical Girl from the head family of Kashin-ryu, a school of flower arranging started in the Edo period (1603-1868). Beautiful and impeccable, she appears to be innocent, but she is actually a wise strategist, able to read any situation she is put into with ease.

charaMessageList.message: I'm not going to fall that easily... I promise...
I've been shouldering destiny my whole life.
You're the one who decides what you do with your life.
May I ask you to help me, kindly?
I want to find that hidden truth...
Supreme simplicity...the essence of Kashin style.
My path continues...straight ahead of me!
Well, that's about it, I guess.
Now if you'll excuse me…
Let's put an end to this, shall we?
It'll be nice if next time goes the same way this time did.

cardMagia.name: White Camellia
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [III] / DEF DOWN (All Foes/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: What Do You Think of This Plan?

cardMagia.name: White Camellia
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [V] / DEF DOWN (All Foes/3 Turns) / Remove Buffs (All Foes)

cardSkill.name: What Do You Think of This Plan?

chara.name: Emiri Kisaki
chara.description: Emiri strives to be the cutest Magical Girl on earth. She has a distinct way of talking, and likes to give everyone a special nickname. Extremely straightforward, Emiri is very easygoing. Somehow she can gain the trust of anyone in almost no time.

charaMessageList.message: Oh, man! This is like, real magic, isn't it?!
Take it easy! Everything's gonna be all right!
It's pretty cool, if ya ask me.
I'm gonna become the cutest Magical Girl ever!
Just keep going! Don't stop those positive vibes!
We should totally do this! It's fun!
Gimme some of that excitement!
Yay! We won!
I'm Just Getting Started!
Looking good!
I'm like super duper strong!

cardMagia.name: My Gigantic Heart
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [I] / Damage Inflicted UP (All Foes/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: My Gigantic Heart
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [III] / Damage Inflicted UP (All Foes/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: My Gigantic Heart
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [V] / Damage Inflicted UP (All Foes/3 Turns) / Bewitch (All Foes/1 Turn)

chara.name: Shizuku Hozumi
chara.description: A Magical Girl who wanders about trying to find a place where she belongs. Unable to figure out what she likes, what she hopes to be, or even her own identity, she is always in a state of anxiety. Like the cafe her family runs, she is calm and quiet.

charaMessageList.message: The ground beneath my feet has never been stable.
Why do I feel this way...?
Do we share the same destiny?
What should I use this power for?
Is it okay for me to be here...?
Yachiyo, I'm sorry.
I have to find a place of my own.
I didn't even know what I was doing...
Yeah, I'm happy too.
How does my smile look?
Do I belong here like everyone else...?

cardMagia.name: Milia de Mense
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals 2 Random Hits [I] / Critical (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I'll Bridge the Gap
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted UP [III] / Follow Up Attack Chance [III]

cardMagia.name: Milia de Mense
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals 2 Random Hits [III] / Critical (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I'll Bridge the Gap
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted UP [V] / Follow Up Attack Chance [V]

cardMagia.name: Milia de Mense
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals 4 Random Hits [V] / Critical (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: I'll Bridge the Gap
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage Inflicted UP [VII] / Follow Up Attack Chance [VII]

chara.name: Akira Shinobu
chara.description: A Magical Girl who looks, talks, and acts like a boy. She was raised and trained alongside the boys at her father's karate dojo. Akira is known as "The Troubleshooter of Sankyoin," because she can't say no to someone in need.

charaMessageList.message: Am I overbearing?
I can't just walk away from someone in need!
All right, let's start with a basic punch! Hyaaa!
I got your request. Leave the rest to me!
I feel strangely uneasy about this...
I want to help in any way I can.
Inaction is cowardice!
Phew… We won this one!
Looks like a decisive defeat to me!
Sorry, but I'm gonna win this one!
Just like I imagined before the battle!

cardMagia.name: Machine-Gun Fists
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [I] / Damage After Using Charge UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: Let's Go Fist To Fist!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [III] / ATK UP [III]

cardMagia.name: Machine-Gun Fists
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [III] / Damage After Using Charge UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: Let's Go Fist To Fist!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [V] / ATK UP [V]

cardMagia.name: Machine-Gun Fists
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Damage After Using Charge UP (Team/3 Turns) / Damage UP (Self/3 Turns)

cardSkill.name: Let's Go Fist To Fist!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Damage After Using Charge UP [VII] / ATK UP [VII]

chara.name: Manaka Kurumi
chara.description: A Magical Girl who is a great chef just like her father. Manaka's family runs a cozy, old-school restaurant. Her cooking is second to none, and her irritating overconfidence is her only flaw. That said, she is just proud of her hard work and has no ill intentions.

charaMessageList.message: My food is ten times better than anyone else's!
Oooooh...The scent of nice, melted cheese...
Voilà! Walnut's special rice omelet!
There is no doubt that Walnut's serves the best dishes around.
Please...give it a try!!
Teach me the joy of cooking!
Magical flavor! Here you go!
It was obvious that this would be the outcome!
I'm gonna have a great meal after this!
How do you feel about a celebratory dessert?
A full-course dinner for the winner!

cardMagia.name: Complete Spices
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Damage in a Verticle Line [I] / Heal (Team)

cardMagia.name: Complete Spices
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Damage in a Verticle Line [II] / Heal (Team)

cardMagia.name: Complete Spices
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Damage in a Verticle Line [IV] / Heal (Team) / ATK UP (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Kako Natsume
chara.description: Kako is a bookworm and the only daughter of the family that runs Natsume Books, a used book store in Kamihama. Her mother is a Japanese teacher. Kako's a softy, never acting selfishly, but that doesn't mean she doesn't make herself completely clear when she has to.

charaMessageList.message: Ah...I can't wait to read the next chapter!
Dad! Can I borrow this book?
Truth is indeed stranger than fiction.
I just love used bookstores!
I need to stand firm, don't I?
The pile of books I want to read just keeps growing…
I have to hold on to these dust jackets!
Phew. It looks like I won...
Looks like I managed to put an end to that…
To be continued, I would say!
Happily ever after!

cardMagia.name: Page Of Twinkle Road
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [I] / HP Regen (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Page Of Twinkle Road
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [II] / HP Regen (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Page Of Twinkle Road
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [IV] / HP Regen (Team/3 Turns) / Remove Debuffs (Team)

chara.name: Meiyui Chun
chara.description: A kung fu master, Meiyui belongs to the Blue Seas Family. She left her parents in China and came to Japan alone. She is well-composed, but she lets that all go when it's time to protect her family and townspeople. She is an excellent Mahjong player.

charaMessageList.message: The Blue Sea Family…they are my everything.
The townspeople are like my family. I must protect them.
I'll never forgive anyone who endangers my family.
My fists are telling me to fight.
I wish I had time for a cup of tea.
Do I look like I'm joking?
Even in battle, one's heart must be as peaceful as a meadow.
No problem.
That was an easy victory.
My fists did the winning.
I will protect the Blue Sea Family.

cardMagia.name: Hawk Shadow Slash
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [III] / Guaranteed Evade (Self /1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Hawk Shadow Slash
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals 3 Random Hits [V] / Guaranteed Evade (Self /1 Turn)

chara.name: Ayaka Mariko
chara.description: A Magical Girl who used to be dark and pessimistic but is now bright and optimistic thanks to her wish. Unlike her old self, she has a positive attitude no matter what happens. However, beneath that smile, she sometimes feels guilty about her new, fake outlook on life.

charaMessageList.message: Don't worry! If you act, results will follow!
I was reborn back then…
No, I'm not that kind of person.
Hahaha! I laugh every time I hear that joke!
They say laughter is the key to happiness! So let's laugh!
Check it out! My best one-liner! Sushi roooooll!
Everything's gonna be all right! Come on, smile! Smiiiiile!
Wooooo! I'm feeling so pumped!
Well, that went as expected!
It didn't work?! I thought it would, though!
We're on a roll! Let's do another!

cardMagia.name: Fun Fun Fun
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [III] / DEF UP (Team/3 Turns)

cardMagia.name: Fun Fun Fun
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / DEF UP (Team/3 Turns) / Remove Debuffs (Team)

chara.name: Masara Kagami
chara.description: An almost emotionless Magical Girl, Masara was born into a peaceful family and raised by two loving parents. Despite all the love she was given, she remains cold, living a life lacking excitement. Deep inside, though, she is thirsty for something more.

charaMessageList.message: I made an objective judgement. No more, no less.
There's nothing to be gained from spending time with me.
Did I protect myself? No, I protected her.
I don't like getting hurt either…
I have no interest in trying to live up to others' expectations.
I find that unpleasant.
From here on, call me. No matter what.
How does it feel? Glad you won?
The correct response to this is joy, right?
I'm glad I managed to protect you.
How do I express these feelings…?

cardMagia.name: Invisible Assassin
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [III] / Follow Up Attack (Self /1 Turn)

cardMagia.name: Invisible Assassin
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages a Single Enemy [V] / Follow Up Attack (Self /1 Turn) / Evade(Self/1 Turn)

chara.name: Konomi Haruna
chara.description: A Magical Girl who loves flowers and works at a flower shop. Konomi is kind and works hard for the shop owner, who she respects. She is a great worker, but can at times get distracted by her love of flowers. She is talented at flower arrangement.

charaMessageList.message: Here! A flower gift for you!
There's a rumor about a Ghost Flower Girl? T-tell me about it...
But it's such a nice gesture to give someone a flower…
I've got a wonderful idea!
Ever since that day...I've been fascinated with flowers.
A flower cake...sounds wonderful...!
How about giving flowers to someone you care about?
Because of you, I'm able to work with a big smile!
How about a...celebration bouquet?
Everyone's smile is in full bloom!
I want to give everyone a bouquet...!

cardMagia.name: Peony Bouquet
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Damage in a Horizontal Line [I] / Heal (Team)

cardMagia.name: Peony Bouquet
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Damage in a Horizontal Line [II] / Heal (Team)

cardMagia.name: Peony Bouquet
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Damage in a Horizontal Line [IV] / Heal (Team) / DEF UP (Team/3 Turns)

chara.name: Rika Ayano
chara.description: A Magical Girl who is into the latest fashion and make-up. Rika appears to be a typical girly girl, but she is actually very seriously in love. She has been secretly admiring the same person for years. A genuine person, she gets along with everyone.

charaMessageList.message: Ugh! I'm gonna release some stress by taking out a Witch!
A guy that sweet...it should be illegal...
It's just right for the princess and the prince to be together!
I had to go and ask that little white fuzzball for that wish.
I came here to meet my Prince Charming!
What's wrong with being different? Is it that bad?
You know, nothing good comes out of desperation!
Gotcha! I won!
Did you see that? I was amazing!
Yup, yup! Big round of applause for everyone!
I'm a loveable Magical Girl!

cardMagia.name: Brilliant Beam
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Stronger Elemental Damage to All Enemies [III]

cardSkill.name: Together We'll Be Okay!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Accele MP UP [VI] / Critical Hit Chance [VI]

cardMagia.name: Brilliant Beam
cardMagia.shortDescription: Deals Stronger Elemental Damage to All Enemies [V] / Charm Chance (All Foes/1 Turn)

cardSkill.name: Together We'll Be Okay!
cardSkill.shortDescription: Accele MP UP [VIII] / Critical Hit Chance [VIII]

chara.name: Oriko Mikuni
chara.description: A blue-blooded Magical Girl whose father is an ex-parliament member. Oriko does whatever it takes to get the job done, but her strong sense of justice, inherited from her father, keeps her from overdoing it. She is refined and loves drinking tea at home.

charaMessageList.message: Do I see some disturbances in my path ahead?
This is a future I've never seen before...what is this?
No matter what path we take, we end up in the same place.
I know exactly what I have to do!
You shall serve and protect me forever!
Everyone only sees me as Hisaomi Mikuni's daughter, and nothing else…
There is only one thing to do... Eliminate Madoka Kaname.
Checkmate.
Still have your will to resist?
Repent!
Would you like to be my pawn too?

cardMagia.name: Oracle Ray
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [IV]

cardMagia.name: Oracle Ray
cardMagia.shortDescription: Damages All Enemies [VI] / Charge MP (Self)

chara.name: Kirika Kure

doppel.name: Doppel of Manipulation
doppel.title: Feature: Needles
doppel.description: The master of this emotion has vowed absolute loyalty to her savior. It penetrates enemy and master alike with sharp needles, sewing the fate of all things tight. This act represents its extreme devotion, such that it offers up everything, including its life to its benefactor, while symbolizing the perilousness of its dependence upon the other, which it cannot maintain its identity without. The sharper the needles are, the more the stitches there are, and the harder it becomes to extricate oneself from it. However, this merely serves as an expression of the master's desire.

chara.description: Oriko's loyal servant, Kirika is a dangerous Magical Girl who doesn't hesitate when acting for her queen, no matter how immoral the deed. She is known as the "Dark Magical Girl" but her mind is pure like a child's. She even has a sweet tooth like one.

charaMessageList.message: Oriko...so merciful, you always forgive me...
I became a Magical Girl to be with you.
I will use this power for you, and you alone.
Enough! Die and atone for your sins!
Oriko, quickly, give me orders!
Just ask, I'll be anything for you!
Ah...so this is what true love is like!
What? You're done already?
As to be expected.
Hey, that was actually kind of fun.
Don't underestimate my love.

cardMagia.name: Vampire Fang

chara.name: Yuma Chitose
chara.description: A young Magical Girl who is very attached to Kyoko, Yuma sees her as her sister, and is willing to do anything for her. Although she is an innocent child, she was abused badly, and experiences terror much more distinctly than others, due to that trauma.

charaMessageList.message: Just like Kyubey said, I became a Magical Girl!
Please… Don't leave me…
I can use healing magic!
If Kyoko gets hurt, I'll make her better!
I want to become a Magical Girl and fight, too!
I became a Magical Girl for Kyoko.
I can be useful too!
I won? Yay!
Tell me how good a girl I am!
I can fight too!
See? I'm helpful!
